regen.absent_element: handling of conflicts between manual and scheduled settings
regen.new_specification: If a manual temperature setting is enacted during a scheduled setting, the manual setting shall take precedence and remain in effect until either the end of the scheduled period or until the manual setting is disabled.

regen.absent_element: details on reverting to the default setting after a manual setting expires
regen.new_specification: Upon the expiration of a manual setting, the thermostat shall automatically revert to its predefined default setting mode, ensuring consistent operation.

regen.absent_element: explicit coverage of action reverting to default after manual setting ends
regen.new_specification: The system shall automatically revert the thermostat to its default setting once a manual setting period expires.

label: When a manual temperature setting ends, the default setting will be used for the next time period.
absence: using the default setting after a manual temperature setting ends
